arXiv.title: Particle creation by peak electric field
arXiv.comments: New version with typos and a misprint corrected. Accepted in EPJC. 28 pages, 1 figure. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:1512.01288
arXiv.abstract: The particle creation by the so-called peak electric field is considered. The latter field is a combination of two exponential parts, one exponentially increasing and another exponentially decreasing. We find exact solutions of the Dirac equation with the field under consideration with appropriate asymptotic conditions and calculate all the characteristics of particle creation effect, in particular, differential mean numbers of created particle, total number of created particles, and the probability for a vacuum to remain a vacuum. Characteristic asymptotic regimes are discussed in detail and a comparison with the pure asymptotically decaying field is considered.
